operator.name: PLCM
operator.help: This operator uses algorithm PLCM to process a pattern mining data set. (Efficient parallel implementation of LCM by Takeaki Uno et al. for frequent itemset mining, done by Benjamin Négrevergne. Check the paper in HPCS'10).

operator.name: test
operator.help: This operator writes a given textObject into a file. It might be specified if an existing file with the same name should be overwritten.
